Che Gu:Kau); [[הֶעְמִיקוּ סָרָה]] Is 31:6 (fig.) they have made deep (their) apostasy; sq. vb., with adverbial force [[שִׁחֵâֻתוּ]] ´[[ה]] Ho 9:9 = they are in the depth of corruption (v. [[הַמַּעֲמִיקִים לַסְתִּר]] Is 29:15 they who deeply hide fr. ´[[י]] (their) counsel; Inf. abs.
